pageProduct.name: Palmers Skin Success Fade Cream for All Skin Types 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Skin Success Anti-Dark Spot Fade Cream visibly improves dark spots, age spots, post-acne scars and uneven skin tone.

Palmer's® Skin Success Anti-Dark Spot Fade Cream is clinically proven to deliver visible results in as little as 2 weeks!* *May take up to 8 weeks. | **Based on a 200 person independent clinical study. Infused with natural skin brighteners Niacinamide, Vitamin C, Japanese Songyi Mushroom Extract and anti-ageing powerhouse Retinol to improve radiance and help minimise the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Palmer's Skin Success visibly improves the appearance of pigmentation, dark spots, age spots and post-acne scars, helping to return them to the same tone as the rest of the skin to leave a healthy, radiant & even complexion.

Suitable For: All skin types.

Product Claims: Corrects dark spots and evens skin tone

Size: 75g

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Clinically proven to visibly improve dark spots, age spots, pigmentation, post-acne scars and uneven skin tone.
• After 2 weeks, 97% of women said the product helped lighten dark spots, 91% of women said it visibly improved discolouration, 83% said it reduced the appearance of age spots, 100% said it improved clarity, and 90% said it left them with brighter, more radiant skin.
• Free from hydroquinone
• For all skin types and tones

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Contains an added sunscreen to help prevent darkening recurring. This product is not intended for use in the prevention of sunburn. An additional daily sunscreen is recommended.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glyceryl Stearate, Mineral Oil (Paraffinum Liquidum), Stearyl Stearate, Niacinamide, Propylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-75 Lanolin, PEG-100 Stearate, Ceteareth-20, Dimethicone, Isopropyl Myristate, Retinol, Tricholoma Matsutake Extract, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Tocopherol Acetate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Sulfite, Sodium Metabisulfite, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Sulfate, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Citronellol, Limonene, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionene. Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Citric Acid, Disdodium EDTA, Butlene Glycol, Magnesium Aliminium Silicate, Hydroxycitronellal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Linalool.

Contains: Niacinamide, Retinol, Vitamin E, Songyi Mushroom Extract, Vitamin C

Directions

Apply to affected areas twice daily on clean, dry skin and follow with sunscreen. Light enough to wear under makeup.

USAGE ADVICE

Patch test first to assess skin sensitivity. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.
